oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Miller, Steven J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Metadata for Digital Collections: A How-To-Do-It Manual
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This practical, hands-on volume will make it easy for readers to acquire the knowledge and skil ls they need, whether they use the book on the job or in a classroom. Author Steven Miller introduces readers to funda mental concepts and practices in a style accessible to beginners and LIS students, as well as experienced practitioner s with little metadata training. He also takes account of the widespread use of digital collection management systems such as CONTENTdm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cataloging of electronic information resources--Standards
Metadata--Standards
Dublin Core
